text:
The 2016–17 First Professional Football League (Bulgarian: Първа професионална футболна лига 2016/17, "Parva profesionalna futbolna liga 2016/17") was the 93rd season of top division football in Bulgaria. It was played from 29 July 2016 to 4 June 2017. Ludogorets Razgrad won the tournament. The top scorer was Claudiu Keșerü, with 22 goals.
Championship round.
Points and goals will carry over in full from the regular season.
Relegation round.
Points and goals will carry over in full from the regular season.
